She walks into the locker room with paint and a paint brush in order to tell them she will be painting on their uniform for the assembly. How do they react to the coach's idea ?
1413.title: An assembly

142.content:
As things have not been working, not winning a single race, Ms. Falkowski decided their entire issue was with morale. The girls, nubile in body and mind, have met their coach on very few occasions and only know she's rather harsh from practice. She'd even yell and scream at times, the girls complained.

On this particular Saturday, Ms. F, as some of the girls had trouble pronouncing her name, decided to have an outing at the mall to raise morale amongst the girls.

They were at the mall too...
142.title: At the Mall

info.brief_description: Join the Track Team in their  em-bare-assing adventures at High Terrace High
info.description:
High Terrace High is a prestigious school with numerous sports awards. However, the Girls Track Team has yet to win a single competition since the school’s inception with this year’s team failing to even be able to go to the county competition. To stop this trend, the school board decided to hire a new Girls Track Coach. The person they hired was Patricia Falkowski, a former national level runner. However, Falkowski, has a few quirks. She is a sadistic woman and likes teasing the members of the team through various embarrassing exercises. However, since she has dirt on each of the twelve girls, they cannot quit or tell someone about it. Here are 4 of the girls, the rest you come up with.

Vivian: A busty senior sprinter of Latin descent that is quite lazy though she is decently fast completing 55m in 9s. She has a tendency to go to parties though. She is 5’ 10”.
Jessie: A tomboyish blond white sophomore distance runner. She lacks stamina so she has difficulty with the workouts. She has B-cup breasts. She had recently moved here from out of state.
Rose: A white girl who is very serious about running. She runs distance and is pretty decent at under 6 minutes per mile. She has B-cup breasts. She is struggling with her grades though.
Suki: A studious freshman that joins the team in hope that she will get scholarships in the future. She doesn’t care too much about the team or winning. She’s a sprinter at 4’6”. She is an A-cup and has a small butt.

Note that this is an ENF story so no transforming, vore, weight gain, age regression,etc. There can be sex but the story should focus on embarrassing the team
